attributes.action: support for the armed forces after leaving
attributes.additional_details:
Its about time this Ministry of defence/government gave our troops the respect - honour - care they deserve after serving their country for years only to be left abandoned when they leave the service..No job - No home - and most of all NO Care. Many of our troops are homeless living on the streets with mental issues after serving in wars.
The MOD/government should be ashamed of themselves after what these troops go through day in day out.
Lets all support our troops and give them what they deserve....Respect - honour and most of all the care they need when they leave the forces.
Please do not abandon them anymore, they fought for this country and deserve much more from this MOD/government...Give them the care they need
